At 1st level, a winter witch's mastery of the cold becomes so great that any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} she casts has its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} increased by 1. Additionally, all spells with fire descriptor she casts have their saving throw DC decreased by 1.
At 5th and 10th level this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} are increased by 1, up to a maximum of 3.
If the winter witch has a Blizzard Servant (winter child's class ability), this bonus is also added to the DC of her Whirlwind of Hail ability.
543f3aba-6e54-432e-8682-7a90bc53336a: At 3rd level, a winter witch's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} become incredibly cold, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} by 1. At 6th level this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} increases to 2.
096f5c02-5cdf-4868-bad3-cf07e68a488f: At 8th level, a winter witch's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} become horrendously cold. Half the cold damage caused by these effects comes from an otherworldly power and is not subject to being reduced by resistance or immunity to cold-based {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
fd0a9336-dc79-4bc0-bd6c-155c45f9c4b3: The otherworldly powers of winter witches are inextricably linked with the frozen outer-realms.
591fbec8-dac1-4198-9a1b-ae7921635af0: When a new winter witch level is gained, the character gains new {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} per day as if she had also gained a level in witch, winter child or shaman spellcasting class she belonged to before she added the prestige class. Additionally, at 2nd level, and every two level after, a winter witch gets a new hex depending on the chosen spellcasting class.
6f8e8bb3-3e03-49a0-b04b-8e98320af028: Winter witch levels stack with shaman levels to determine the power of shaman hexes and frost spirit abilities, and with witch levels to determine the power of witch hexes and access to major and grand hexes, and for acquiring patron {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. Additionally, winter witch levels stack with druid levels to determine the level of the Blizzard Servant (winter child class ability).
